Html: I have seen a few performance recommendations to remove all "extra" whitespace namely carriage returns tabs etc. from ASPX files and ASCX files to improve the performance of a site.  Can you use Chirpy to remove all but single spaces from ASPX and ASCX files when you deploy a web site?  I am wanting a way to test this and see what the performance enhancements are.

Presently this feature is not support by chirpy.

Chirpy 1.0.0.5 is more modularized create you custom module.

http://www.weirdlover.com/2010/09/07/chirpy-to-the-xxxtreme-v1-0-0-5-da-kine-release/#third

Hey runxc1,

I think the performance gain is probably negligible. That said, if it's something that you feel obliged to do, we'd love to possibly include the engine in the project.

Cheers,

Evan
